newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan money market rates end up amid operation.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan money market rates end up amid operation.

text.p: Pakistan's inter-bank money market rates fluctuated widely on Wednesday before ending up as banks were uncertain about the amount picked up in a State (central) Bank of Pakistan (SBP) open market operation.
Rates for onvernight funds went as high as nine percent and tested the lows of three percent, showing a mixed trend throughout the day, one dealer said.

He said deals cut at the close of the day were in the range of nine to 10 percent, the dealer said. The market would take its direction on Thursday from the amount accepted by the SBP in Wednesday's open market operation. - Ovais Subhani 9221-5685192
